import React, { useState } from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faArrowDown } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { faArrowUp } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' export default function BillingTransaction() { const userTransaction = [ { transactionName: "Netflix" , transactionTime: "27 March 2020, at 12:30 PM" , transactionStatus: "true" , transactionAmount: 2500 }, { transactionName: "Apple" , transactionTime: "27 March 2020, at 12:30 PM" , transactionStatus: "false" , transactionAmount: 2500 }, ] // const [moneyTransClass , setMoneyTransClass] = useState("debit"); // const Transactionsloop = userTransaction.forEach(element => { // (transactionstatus) ? setMoneyTransClass("credit"): setMoneyTransClass("debit"); // }); return ( <>

Your Transactions

  • {userTransaction[0].transactionName}

    {userTransaction[0].transactionTime}

    ${userTransaction[0].transactionAmount}

  • {userTransaction[1].transactionName}

    {userTransaction[1].transactionTime}

    $ {userTransaction[1].transactionAmount}

) }
